name: Oasis 42
description:
Oasis 42

 is a small storydriven game.
You're playing nola.
Your dad had a small incident, in which he broke his arm.
Biggest problem about that broken arm is that he is opening a bar on FRIDAY.  

Not a single drink will be mixed on that day

if you wouldn't rush to your dads aid!

Explore a small part of the city 42,

mix a rather strange drink in a small minigame 

and read through a short heartwarming story!

Controls: Credits Fonts:

https://www.dafont.com/de/ethnocentric.font#null

https://www.dafont.com/de/bigmacca.font

Music:

ES_Cats Walking - Yomoti

ES_Before Chill - Yomoti

SFX By Epidemic Sound

Tools used:

Blender (3D and animation)

Creative Cloud

Unity Engine

Reaper (Audio)

Fmod (Audio integration)

InkDialogue (Dialogue system)

Freebie Skyseries (Skybox)

Special thanks htk Academy
